Header.title: We are a Survey and Geotechnical firm
Header.paragraph: "We provide training, technical support and management consultancy services to the oil and gas industry. We specialize in providing Land Survey Services, offshore hydrographic surveys, Remotely Operated Vehicle (ROV) inspection and intervention surveys as well as geophysical survey services. A full complement of ROV, geotechnical and geophysical equipment are maintained in Nigeria along with fully trained and experienced national and expatriate survey and engineering personnel."

About.paragraph: C.G.S.L is an indigenous company incorporated in Nigeria that has evolved into a leading front-end company providing a range of land survey, dredging support, offshore survey and support services to the Nigerian Oil and Gas sector.
